hero.title: Build Smart. Build Fast.
hero.subtitle: We specialize in delivering high-quality software solutions and AI-powered MVPs — helping startups and enterprises move from idea to launch in record time.

speed.title: Speed & Innovation
speed.description: MVPs delivered in weeks, not months

trusted.title: Trusted Delivery
trusted.description: Reliable solutions tailored to your business goals

clientLogos.title: Trusted by Industry Leaders
clientLogos.subtitle: Join the companies that trust us with their most important projects

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: Comprehensive development solutions tailored to your business needs

webDev.title: Web Development
webDev.description: We craft modern, scalable, and responsive web applications designed to grow with your business. From landing pages to enterprise platforms, our solutions are built with performance and usability in mind.

mobileDev.title: Mobile Development
mobileDev.description: Our team builds intuitive mobile applications for iOS and Android, ensuring a smooth experience across devices. Whether it's a business app or a customer-facing solution, we make it fast, secure, and user-friendly.

uxUiDesign.title: UX & UI Design
uxUiDesign.description: Beautiful, intuitive designs that create exceptional user experiences. We focus on usability, accessibility, and visual appeal to ensure your product delights users.

aiAdvantage.label: AI Advantage:
aiAdvantage.description: We use AI-driven development to accelerate delivery, validate ideas quickly, and keep quality at the highest standard.

about.title: Meet Our Team
about.subtitle: Three passionate entrepreneurs building the future of software development with innovation and expertise.

javohir.name: Javohir Atabekov
javohir.bio: CTO and SAP Business One consultant with extensive experience in ERP implementations and business process optimization. Leads technology strategy and delivery to connect business goals with scalable, reliable systems.
javohir.description: CTO and SAP Business One consultant with strong experience in ERP implementation, digital transformation, and business process optimization. Skilled project manager leading initiatives that connect technology with business goals to deliver scalable growth.

jahongir.name: Jahongir Masharipov
jahongir.bio: Passionate about making sports accessible to everyone. Over 2 years of experience in managing sports projects and leading innovative teams.

alex.name: Alex Smith
alex.bio: Experienced full-stack developer with expertise in modern web technologies and cloud solutions. Passionate about creating scalable applications and mentoring junior developers to build high-quality software solutions.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: We believe in delivering high-quality software solutions that not only meet technical requirements but also drive real business value. Our combined expertise in technology and business strategy ensures every project is built for success.

portfolio.title: Featured Projects
portfolio.subtitle: Discover our latest work showcasing innovation, quality, and client success.

bron24.name: Bron24
bron24.description: A comprehensive 24/7 business management platform with real-time analytics, customer management, and automated workflows. Built for modern enterprises.

vitaCoffee.name: Vita Coffee
vitaCoffee.description: Premium coffee e-commerce platform with subscription management, inventory tracking, and mobile-optimized checkout experience.

techflowCrm.name: TechFlow CRM
techflowCrm.description: Customer relationship management system with advanced lead tracking, automated email campaigns, and detailed reporting dashboard.

cta.title: Ready to Build Your Next Big Idea?
cta.subtitle: Join successful startups and enterprises who trust us to deliver exceptional software solutions. Let's discuss your project and turn your vision into reality.

footer.description: Building high-quality software and AI-powered solutions that drive business growth.

pricing.subtitle: Flexible outsourcing solutions to fit your business needs - from launching fast MVPs to scaling enterprise-level systems.
